items.title: Chronic Back Pain in Seniors May Ease With Acupuncture
items.description: New research offers evidence for considering acupuncture as part of comprehensive, low-risk pain management for older adults. Medscape Medical News

items.title: FDA Approves Lurbinectedin Combo for ES-SCLC Maintenance
items.description: The approval is for a first-line combination maintenance therapy for extensive-stage SCLC. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Endocarditis Deaths Rise in Pregnancy-Related Infections
items.description: Sepsis was the leading cause of infection-related maternal mortality. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Autism Is Not One Disorder, New Data Show

items.title: MPTS Issues New Guidance on Doctor Misconduct Cases
items.description: Updated guidance from the MPTS seeks to improve consistency and transparency in tribunal decisions involving serious cases of misconduct. Medscape New...
